Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Aston', 3: '...Leader, I recall advising you to be careful with your actions... in front of others, at least.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "If that big fellow did something, then it's best to increase our battle power.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Aston', 3: "You cannot follow them, we can't afford any spontaneous actions at the moment.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'So you want me to go "protect" those so-called better humans?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Aston', 3: "At least nominally, you'll need to play the part.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Aston', 3: 'I fear that slippery old fox would take action if two of our precious battle power resources are deployed.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Please evacuate to the rear carriages through here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Everyone, this way. Staying in the front carriages is dangerous, please evacuate to the back immediately.', 4: '2'}
